name: MN Solution IT Group
overview:
HostPlate.com started operating in 2009 in stealth mode, planning and developing, and launched as a private subset of MN Solution IT Group Corporation in 2010. Services include Linux VPS and Windows VPS powered by VMware and OpenVZ, respectively. We also offer affordable and reliable dedicated servers. Our servers are located in EvoSwitch Datacenter, Amsterdam, Netherlands. Extremely secure, superb connections, spacious data floor having more than 9,000 SQM and certified by ISO 9001 and 27001 are the specifications of EvoSwitch data centers.

Companyâ€™s major focus is to provide unmetered solutions for both its virtualization and dedicated services.Customer service and support is at the forefront of what HostPlate does on a day-to-day basis. The company is constantly working to improve its service and support and achieve its goal of becoming a leading company in virtualization and dedicated hosting market.
